server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The main server with all functionalities and the user data. Has a request method which responds on every request from the client.
    Version:
    2013-01-05
    Author:
    Tobias Schuschnig

    • Method Detail

      • request

        public java.lang.String request(Message message)
        This method receives all requests of the client
        Parameters:
        message - contains every parameters for the work step
        Returns:
        result of the operation which is handed over to the client via TCP.

      • notify

        public void notify(java.util.ArrayList<User> al,
          java.lang.String message)
        In this method the notify method of the class UDPNotifiers is called. There the message is forwarded via UDP to the correct clients.
        Parameters:
        al - contains the users which should receive the message
        message - the message which is sended to the client.
